dmca.title: NetEnforcers complains of  images in Froogle
dmca.body:
Thu, 24 Aug 2006 13:23:24 -0400

Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints


I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [Sony Camcorder] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.


Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [Sony Camcorder]/:



SportCahlet


http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://sch.imageg.net/graphics/product_images/p2924365reg.jpg&size=2&dhm=623e18ef&hl=en
